text: This page lists tree and large shrub species native to Georgia, as well as cultivated, invasive, naturalized, and introduced species. == Native Trees == Torreya taxifolia, Critically Endangered Pinus palustris, Endangered Tsuga canadensis, Near Threatened Leitneria floridana, Near Threatened Juglans cinerea, Endangered Castanea dentata, Critically Endangered Quercus georgiana, Endangered Franklinia alatamaha, Extinct in the wild Elliottia racemosa, G2 - Imperiled Sideroxylon tenax, G3 - Vulnerable Fraxinus americana, Critically Endangered Fraxinus caroliniana, Endangered Fraxinus pensylvanica, Critically Endangered Fraxinus profunda, Critically Endangered Fraxinus quadrangulata, Critically Endangered {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! title: List of trees of Georgia (U.S. state)
